snippet.title: Godmorgon: Spooky Ride - Itch.io launch trailer
snippet.description:
Godmorgon: Spooky Ride is a 3D deck-building and roguelike game in which you must escape a haunted ghost ride managed by The Ringmaster. Use cards to move, protect yourself and attack the enemies sent by your mysterious opponent to find your way out! 

Download here: https://rolling-dices-interactive.itch.io/godmorgon-spooky-ride 

Follow us:
→ Twitter: https://twitter.com/GodmorgonR
→ Discord: https://discord.com/invite/5C95vCu
→ Devlogs: https://minstery.fr/category/godmorgon-spooky-ride/
